name: Light Theme for YouTube Music
description: A free skin that adds a light theme and redesign to YouTube Music on the web.
additional_info:
SUBSCRIBE to update notifications for bug fixes & improvements!!

This project's on GitHub! Latest Version: 1.0 Released on: July 6th, 2021 Release Notes: --First Release! --Thanks for your support! Websites change all the time. If this skin looks all messed up now, let me know so I can fix it! Feedback/things I missed are appreciated, (tech_how_youtuber55@yahoo.com) but please don't mention the following known bugs unless you'd like to provide information on how to fix them: Known Issues: --Elipsis menu remains black on some elements --Fullscreen and minimize buttons remain black on Now Playing video/album artwork --'Clear filters' button is not shown --Video overlay gradient slightly overlaps --Notification text appears black when removing song from playlist --Empty space below some menus --Left arrow gets stuck on carousel --Next/Prev arrows slightly off-center --Video player behaves strange when minimized --Loader around play button remains black This theme may not be copied and/or redistributed in any way, shape or form, excluding the one copy you obtain from my Userstyles or GitHub page.
